title: Dow dives 2 percent as China-U.S. trade spat intensifies
text:
Dow dives 2 percent as China-U.S. trade spat intensifies 7:28pm IST - 00:41 
The Dow Jones Industrial Average sank more than 2 percent at the open on Wednesday as big U.S. manufacturers, grain merchants and chipmakers bore the brunt of a deepening trade conflict between China and the United States.   
The Dow Jones Industrial Average sank more than 2 percent at the open on Wednesday as big U.S. manufacturers, grain merchants and chipmakers bore the brunt of a deepening trade conflict between China and the United States.  //reut.rs/2q4da20
